product_name: Pearl Izumi Silk Lite Bike Socks - Women's
long_description: A perennial favorite, the Pearl Izumi Silk Lite bike socks for women fit like a second skin, providing moisture-absorbent comfort. ELITE fabric is durable and soft, and manages moisture. Silk Lite bike socks feature mesh ventilation over top of foot to reduce bulkiness, maximize coolness and keep socks dry. Ultra-smooth toe design enhances comfort. Anatomic arch compression panel contours fit and adds arch support. Low-cut cuff height. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A perennial favorite, the Pearl Izumi Silk Lite bike socks for women fit like a second skin, providing moisture-absorbent comfort.
